item.title: Podcast 16: Are you direct, or indirect with Women?
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description: You’ll learn - Why women can’t fall for ‘indirect’ men - How to pass her “Does he have self confidence?”-radar - How to take it to the next level ALSO - Check out this video from another "lunatic" who created "The Honey Trick to get women" where he explains The honey trick to get women. […]
item.content:encoded:
You’ll learn

- Why women can’t fall for ‘indirect’ men

- How to pass her “Does he have self confidence?”-radar

- How to take it to the next level

ALSO

- Check out this video from another "lunatic" who created "The Honey Trick to get women" where he explains The honey trick to get women. He’s got some interesting points. Make sure you watch the video till the end!

- If you’ve liked this podcast, you’ll love my AttractionCourse

item.title: Podcast 14: How to have a one night standâ€¦and then what?
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description: I’ll discuss an E-mail in this podcast from a guy who had a one night stand with a very attractive woman (she should be way out of his reach, but he still attracted her)….and now he wants more. Then I’ll discuss an E-mail from an average Joe who got dumped. You’ll learn: - how to […]
item.content:encoded:
I’ll discuss an E-mail in this podcast from a guy who had a one night stand with a very attractive woman (she should be way out of his reach, but he still attracted her)….and now he wants more.
Then I’ll discuss an E-mail from an average Joe who got dumped.

You’ll learn:
- how to attract a woman who wouldn’t even see you standing
- how to go from that first night together to a real relationship
- what to do when a woman dumps you

And since you’re a podcast listener, here’s your discounted link to the attraction course.

item.title: Podcast 13: Why women HATE nice guys, part 2
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description: Why do women absolutely hate nice guys, and what do they consider “nice guy behavior”? During this podcast, you’ll get to hear part of a session from my “AttractionCourse” where I explain what nice guy behavior is, how destructive it is and how to avoid it. If you don’t want to end up being her […]
item.content:encoded:
Why do women absolutely hate nice guys, and what do they consider “nice guy behavior”?

During this podcast, you’ll get to hear part of a session from my “AttractionCourse” where I explain what nice guy behavior is, how destructive it is and how to avoid it.

If you don’t want to end up being her best friend, or worse, getting dumped. Then this podcast is very important.
